turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up with a general physician. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! I can help with that. To begin, can you please provide your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: My name is John Smith and my date of birth is 05/10/1980. I'd prefer an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter if possible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, John Smith, born on 05/10/1980. Let me check Dr. Carter's availability... Unfortunately, she's fully booked for the next two weeks. However, Dr. Robert Jones has availability. Would you be interested in an appointment with him?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, two weeks? That's a bit long. Okay, I guess I'll take Dr. Jones. What times does he have available next week?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... Dr. Jones has openings next week on Tuesday at 9:00 AM or Thursday at 2:30 PM. Which works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm... Those times are not ideal. Is there any flexibility with the appointment time on Thursday? I need to be home by 3:30 at the latest, so can the Thursday appointment be earlier?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry, I do not have the capabilities to check for earlier times. But, Thursday at 2:30 PM is the only time available. Would you like to confirm the appointment at that time?
